data.title: Richard Branson says Virgin Galactic will accept Bitcoin
House intel bill adds $75 million to NSA budget to stop future Snowdens
Moroccan teen, forced to marry her rapist, commits suicide
Obama signs deal to keep troops in Afganistan until 2024.
Five arrested in Thailand under drug ring with meth produced from North Korea. The kicker: The meth was tested by authorities and found at over 99% purity.
Crack-smoking Toronto Mayor Rob Ford's popularity unscathed, maintains higher approval rating than Barack Obama
Malaysia cuts fuel subsidies to fund welfare payments for the poor
Al Qaeda opens a complaints department.
Magnus Carlsen wins Chess World championship
"Confidentiality is sacred" Doctor in Norway destroys evidence of DNA on drugs to protect patient's anonymity. Charged with obstruction of evidence by police. Ruled not guilty by supreme court.
